text: Ej odamon, agar ʙa Parvardigori xud nosiposi kuned, imon naored va az pajomʙaras pajravi nakuned, haroina, Alloh az sumo ʙenijoz ast va sumo hasted, ki ʙa U ehtijoc dored va nosiposiro ʙaroi ʙandagonas namepisandad. Mepisandad, ki siposguzor ʙosand. Va hec kas ʙori gunohi digarero ʙar dus namekasad. Bozgasti hamai sumo nazdi Parvardigoraton ast. U sumoro az korhoe, ki mekarded, ogoh mekunad, U haroina, ʙa on ci dar dilho meguzarad, ogoh ast
